description: Dashboard for Micrometer instrumented applications (Java, Spring Boot)

targets.expr: sum(jvm_memory_used_bytes{host="$host", app="$application", version="$version", area="heap"})*100/sum(jvm_memory_max_bytes{host="$host", app="$application", version="$version", area="heap"})
sum(jvm_memory_used_bytes{host="$host", app="$application", version="$version", area="nonheap"})*100/sum(jvm_memory_max_bytes{host="$host", app="$application", version="$version", area="nonheap"})

title: Spring Boot - Micrometer - Matthew
